strings:
<voice_0x0100154A><se_def>Marcello: Ladies and gentlemen! As you are all aware,
the Lord High Priest has passed away.
Our prayers go with him...
<voice_0x0100154B><se_def>Marcello: Now he sits beside the Goddess. There are those intent on making spurious allegations about the circumstances surrounding his passing...
<voice_0x0100154C><se_def>Marcello: ...but I can assure you, he died a natural death.
<voice_0x0100154D><se_def>Marcello: And I tell you this!
<voice_0x0100154E><se_def>Marcello: I have no intention of becoming the next Lord High Priest!
<voice_0x0100154F><se_def>Marcello: Or rather, I have no intention of becoming another hollow idol like all those we have had to endure until now!
<voice_0x01001550><se_def>Marcello: I ask you, what is a king?
<voice_0x01001551><se_def>Marcello: A king is but a man born into the right family!
<voice_0x01001552><se_def>Marcello: Should that give him the right to do whatever he pleases!? Be waited on hand and foot, and answer to no man!?
<voice_0x01001553><se_def>Marcello: A soldier demanding such treatment would never be tolerated!
<voice_0x01001554><se_def>Marcello: Even if such a soldier had the stature of a king, he would never be allowed to escape the social class into which he was born.

<voice_0x01001555><se_def>Marcello: I am such a soldier! Born out of wedlock,
and thrown out of my own home! A commoner like me has no right to be Lord High Priest!

<voice_0x01001556><se_def>Marcello: That is the belief of the church. Yes!
Such positions of weighty responsibility should be filled exclusively by incompetent aristocrats!
<voice_0x01001557><se_def>Marcello: Our great, noble and righteous Holiness! Whatever did he achieve!?
<voice_0x01001558><se_def>Marcello: A sorrowful prayer for our uncertain world? Perhaps...but certainly nothing more!
<voice_0x01001559><se_def>Marcello: The Lord High Priest, our kings, our Goddess! All of them reign over us from their high exalted thrones! Each one as useless as the next!
<voice_0x0100155A><se_def>Marcello: ...But I am different.
<voice_0x0100155B><se_def>Marcello: For I have not one drop of nobility in my veins.
<voice_0x0100155C><se_def>Marcello: Yet I am here! And only as a result of nothing but my own merit!

<voice_0x0100155D><se_def>Marcello: Follow me! It is time to oust our artless rulers!
It is time to choose a new leader!
<voice_0x0100155E><se_def>Marcello: So...

<voice_0x0100155F><se_def>Marcello: You have a choice.
Follow me...
<voice_0x01001560><se_def>Marcello: Or meet your fate just as those intruders shall!
Out of nowhere, a voice can be heard...
<voice_0x01001561><center>Now it's time to use my power!
The soul of the fledgling Godbird speaks to <hero>!
<voice_0x01001562><se_def>Marcello: You should have stayed away!
<voice_0x01001563><se_def>Marcello: But if you stand between me and my destiny...
<voice_0x01001564><se_def>Marcello: You leave me no choice.
